entry.title: Bash Script to Add ISP IP to Security Group

link.title: Bash Script to Add ISP IP to Security Group

entry.summary: Suppose, you have an EC2 instance and you need to access it when you are travelling or changing your network provider. Accessing IP restricted AWS Services is a headache as you need to add your ISP IP address to security group everytime your ISP IP address changes (unless you are using a VPN!). Here is a simple bash script that adds your current ISP IP address to security group for SSH access:...

entry.title: Python - find number of identical pairs in an array

link.title: Python - find number of identical pairs in an array

entry.summary: Let’s see how to find number of pairs of elements of the array that are equal but that occuppy different positions in the array. That means, a pair of indices (P,Q) is called identical if 0 <= P < Q and array element A[P] = A[Q]. The goal is to calculate the number of identical pairs of indices. For example, consider array A such that: A[0] = 3 A[1] = 5 a[2] = 6 A[3] = 3 A[4] = 3 A[5] =...

entry.title: Python - make palindrome by replacing '?' in a string

link.title: Python - make palindrome by replacing '?' in a string

entry.summary: This is a program in Python which returns palindrome which can be obtained by replacing all of the question marks in the given string str with ‘Z’. If no palindrome can be obtained, the function will return the string “Not palindrome”. A palindrome is a string that reads the same both forwards and backwards. Some examples of palindromes are: “malayalam”, “radar”, “47874” Sample output: Gi...

entry.title: Upgrade Rancher version
entry.summary: When you upgrade your Kubernetes cluster version, the kubectl client in Rancher may not be compatible and you need to update Rancher to latest version in order to fix it. How to upgrade Rancher version If you have launched Rancher server without using an external DB The Rancher server database will be inside the currently running container.
